Key Match Events: India beat South Africa by 82 runs
Pre-Game Insights: The hosts face another must-win situation with the Proteas leading the series 2-1
Post-Match Reflections: After losing the first two games, the young Indian team made a strong comeback to win the third T20I on Tuesday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The India vs South Africa, 4th T20I match will be played at the Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Rajkot.
The India vs South Africa, 4th T20I match will be available for streaming on Hotstar.
Others: The match will start at 7:00 PM IST.
The India vs South Africa, 4th T20I match will broadcasted on the Star Sports Network.
